pages.title: Branded Packaging
pages.content: The experience starts with a high-end, telescoping black box with Framework, DiscoShark, and Totem branding. Molded foam protects the collectible, along with space for optional event inserts (stickers, inlays, etc).

pages.title: DiscoShark
pages.content: Inside the box is an miniature, electroplated recreation of the iconic DiscoShark artwork on display at Sound Nightclub and Coachella's Yuma Tent. It hangs from a customs stand that features subtle Framework branding.

pages.title: Bespoke Audio Player
pages.content: We created a custom dark-mode audio player for Framework –– allowing fans to connect to a live Spotify playlist. The playlist is owned and updated by the Framework team, letting it be event-specific and helps ensure rights holders are properly compensated.
